lead_paragraph: An article last Sunday about the track star Usain Bolt misstated the number of Olympic gold medals Carl Lewis won during his career. He won nine gold medals and one silver; he was not a 10-time Olympic gold medalist.
snippet: An article last Sunday about the track star Usain Bolt misstated the number of Olympic gold medals Carl Lewis won during his career. He won nine gold medals and one silver; he was not a 10-time Olympic gold medalist.
